name: Bio (Prototype)
description:
game inspired by the covid-19 aka ncov-2019 made for a game jam 
i hope all the people in china and wuhai are safe now and next time lets do our best to prevent a epidemic so it doesnt evolve into a pandemicthe concept would be is to collect resources for a comunity hospital and depending on who you play as thats who in charge of the hospital will be if you play as a boy your sister will take care of people and the other way around if you dont get enough resources by the end of the day everyone will die but i didnt have enough time to code that, sorry
COMMUNITY-DISCORD
SOCIAL MEDIA -TWITTER
